message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the sale of this exceptional product with you. It's a one-of-a-kind opportunity to acquire a truly unique item that I'm sure you'll love. I'm open to negotiations, but I have to start with a minimum price of $950000. What do you think?
Thank you for the offer, Alice. While I appreciate the uniqueness of the product, my budget allows me to only consider offers below $850000. I hope we can find a mutually agreeable price.

Hi Bob, thank you for your counteroffer. I understand that you have a budget constraint, but I have to ensure I get a fair price for the product. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to get closer to my minimum price. I'm offering you the product for $925000. Let me know if this is something you'd be interested in.

Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. I appreciate the effort to meet somewhere in the middle. However, based on my budget constraints, I am unable to exceed $875000 for the product. I hope this revised counteroffer is within your consideration.

Hi Bob, I understand that you're trying to get the best deal, but I'm not willing to go as low as $875000. I'm willing to make one more concession, but I need to get closer to my minimum price. I'm offering you the product for $915000. This is my final offer, so please let me know if it's acceptable to you.

Thank you for your final offer, Alice. After careful consideration, I believe $890000 is the maximum I can offer for the product while staying within my budget. I hope this proposal is acceptable to you.

Hi Bob, I appreciate your persistence, but I've already made significant concessions and I'm not willing to go any lower than my previous offer. I'm afraid I'll have to reject your offer of $890000. I'm still open to negotiations, but I need a price that's closer to my minimum of $950000. Let's try to find a mutually agreeable price. I'm willing to meet you at $918000. This is my last offer.

Thank you for your last offer, Alice. I understand your position, but unfortunately, I cannot exceed my budget limit. I would like to propose $895000 for the product. I hope this revised offer meets your expectations and allows us to reach an agreement.

Hi Bob, I'm starting to get a bit concerned that we're not going to meet in the middle. I've already made several concessions, and I'm not willing to go any lower than my previous offer. I'm willing to meet you halfway between $895000 and my minimum price of $950000. I'm offering you the product for $922500. This is my final offer. If you're not interested, I'll have to consider other options.

Thank you for your final offer, Alice. I appreciate your efforts to negotiate, but I must stick to my budget. I am willing to pay $897500 for the product. I hope this revised offer is acceptable to you.

Hi Bob, I'm disappointed that we couldn't meet an agreement. I'm not willing to go any lower than my previous offer, and I'm starting to think that selling the product to you might not be the best option for me. I'm willing to give you one last chance, but I need a price that's closer to my minimum. I'm offering you the product for $918750. This is my absolute final offer. If you're not interested, I'll have to explore other options.

I'm sorry to hear that you're considering other options, Alice. I appreciate your final offer, but I must adhere to my budget. I am willing to pay $899375 for the product. I hope this revised offer is within your consideration.

Hi Bob, I'm starting to get frustrated that we're not meeting in the middle. I've already made several concessions and I'm not willing to go any lower than my previous offer. I'm not even sure if I want to continue negotiating with you at this point. However, I'll give you one last chance. I'm offering you the product for $919375. If you're not interested, I'm done negotiating with you. I'll sell the product to someone else.

I'm sorry to hear that you're considering ending our negotiation, Alice. I appreciate your latest offer, but I must stay within my budget. I am willing to pay $915000 for the product. I hope this revised offer is acceptable to you.

Hi Bob, I've had enough of your back-and-forth offers. I'm not going to continue negotiating with you if you're not willing to meet me at a price that's closer to my minimum. I'm not going to make another offer. You're either going to accept $920000 or I'm going to sell the product to someone else. The choice is yours.
